title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR.

42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT
42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER
42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION
42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION
52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS
53. ELEMENT EXTENSION

65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: tips shows in given format
Actual Result: tips shows in one line
OB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line.
EB: The expected behavior is that the tips should be displayed in the given format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Put a large content in a text item.
2. Observe the tips that are displayed.

The tips are expected to be displayed in the given format, but instead, they are displayed in one line.
